survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer experiences with AI-powered support tools, identifying strengths and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale. Ensure options cover all likely interaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?

questions.question_text: Which types of AI-powered support tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an opt-out option for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Display 'None of the above' at the end.

script.question_text: Which types of AI-powered support tools have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of responses from AI-powered support tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Label all scale points for clarity.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of responses from AI-powered support tools?

questions.question_text: What do you value most in AI-powered customer support?
answer_options: Integration with human agents when needed
questions.client_notes: Prioritize mobile-friendly layout for multi-choice questions.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Randomize order of first four options, keep last option fixed.

script.question_text: What do you value most in AI-powered customer support?
answer_options: Integration with human agents when needed

questions.question_text: How often do you need to escalate to a human agent after using AI support?
questions.client_notes: Include a full range of frequency options to capture meaningful data.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Vertical layout for small screens.

script.question_text: How often do you need to escalate to a human agent after using AI support?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered customer support systems?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with character counter. Mobile-responsive text area.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered customer support systems?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to prefer AI-powered support over human support for simple inquiries?
questions.client_notes: Use balanced wording for the likelihood scale to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Include 'Prefer not to answer' option if needed.

script.question_text: How likely are you to prefer AI-powered support over human support for simple inquiries?

questions.question_text: Which industries do you think benefit most from AI-powered customer support? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to force prioritization. Include 'Other' with text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with selection limit. Show 'Other' text field when selected.

script.question_text: Which industries do you think benefit most from AI-powered customer support? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the personality/tone of AI support tools you've interacted with?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale for tone perception. Avoid leading options.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Consider adding visual analog scale alternative.

script.question_text: How would you rate the personality/tone of AI support tools you've interacted with?

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about AI-powered customer support?
questions.client_notes: Include 'No concerns' option to avoid forcing negative responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Show 'Other' text field when selected.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about AI-powered customer support?
